name: Derick
description:
I consider myself very down to earth, classy, easy to talk to. I do not like to play games with women! I have lived a very wonderful life with my wife before she passed away. I have a SON. I am very responsible enjoy LAUGHTER WHICH IS VERY IMPORTANT!! I love to walk on the beach, go to concerts and like to hang out with friends. I am looking for a Partner in Life! I don’t like this on line dating.
I am from the old school don’t know if it’s going to work or NOT, no Games please. Lets meet and see! looking for a honest up beat person that is ready to start off slow and let it happen!! Lets talk and see what happens ? Love to take long walks to watch the Sunset to end the night. LOVE to make the person in my life FEEL Special.
Like to dance or just listen to a good band. The one thing all my friends say about me is that I’m very caring and honest. My partner must be Trusting and need to be open and honest! I am of great passion
